reviews.review:
Much like portal, Core mechanics of this master piece include use of instant travelling (warp hole) portals, weighted objects (like companion cube), and surface modifying gel (like blue bounce gel) to reach a checkpoint from where you go another level and core loop starts. 

For the Dynamics, your main aim is to get out of Aperture Labs because you are being treated as guinea pig and you're too tenacious let GLADOS (an awesome AI who loves science and experiment (and in some cases just to kill you, you know, the usual)) get the best of you. 

Art style is amazing, lab and level design helps player telling them what to do but still making it challenging.  

If you are a puzzle person, love to drop-in at one place and end up in another place (much like those drunk nights) and enjoy a well orchestrated story line, this game is for you.
If you can imaging what i mean by saying all this, "Now you're thinking with portals".
Questo gioco √® stato entusiasmante con una grafica e una story line da togliere il fiato, aspetto con ansia un possibile Portal 3
I would recommend this game to anyone and everyone. This is a puzzle classic masterpiece, I grew up playing this game since my childhood,
Truly mindblowing or i should say mindbogging

This is a great sequel to Portal 1. I suggest it to people who have played the original, or people who love puzzle video games.

Portal 2 is fantatstic. Builds on the first game that keeps true to the first portal while doing just enough that is different to keep it fresh. The added couch co-op is fantastically refreshing in a day and age where split screen is almost non existent. I am always looking for great games to play with my wife at home and this game more than delivers.

The plot is so beautiful that I would GLaDly play this game over and over. I would recommend this game to all people. You will probably enjoy it.
